column1: S218I.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S218I.DECK.  218. SURVEY NUMBER
S218I.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.
S218I.FORM.  1. S-218U - UNITED STATES FORM 2. S-218C - CENTRAL PACIFIC BASE COMMAND FORM 3. S-218I - CHINA-BURMA-INDIA FORM
S218I.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR RANK OR GRAD?  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 4. SERGEANT (ANY GRADE) OR TECHNICIAN 3RD OR 4TH GRADE 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q2. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARM? E. IF YOU HAVE SERVED PREVIOUSLY IN THE ARMY, GIVE THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE A NATIONAL GUARDSMAN GIVE THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT ENTERED THE ARMY.  ANP (ACTUAL NUMBER MONTHS) 08. 8 MONTHS . . . 99. 99 MONTHS OR MORE 00. NO ANSWER
S218I.Q3. HAVE YOU BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT IN THIS WA?  1. YES, I HAVE BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT 2. YES, I HAVE BEEN UNDER ENEMY FIRE, BUT NOT IN ACTUAL COMBAT 3. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q4. ARE YOU ENTITLED TO WEAR ANY CAMPAIGN STAR? IF YES, HOW MAN?  01. YES, ONE STAR 02. YES, TWO STARS 03. YES, THREE STARS 04. YES, FOUR STARS 05. YES, FIVE STARS 06. YES, SIX STARS 07. YES, SEVEN STARS 08. YES, EIGHT STARS 09. YES, NINE OR MORE STARS 10. YES, NO ANSWER 11. NO 00. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q5. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING DECORATIONS OR AWARDS DO YOU HAV? (DISTINGUISHED-SERVICE CROSS, LEGION OF MERIT, SILVER STAR, DISTINGUISHED-FLYING CROSS, SOLDIER'S MEDAL, BRONZE STAR MEDAL (NOT CAMPAIGN STAR), AIR MEDAL, PURPLE HEART) Z. COUNT EACH STAR, AWARD AND OAK LEAF CLUSTER SEPARATELY AND CODE THE TOTAL.  ANP (TOTAL NUMBER) 01. TOTAL OF ONE . . . 08. TOTAL OF EIGHT 99.I DON'T HAVE ANY AWARDS OR DECORATIONS 00. NO ANSWER
S218I.Q6. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED 3. WIDOWED, DIVORCED, OR SEPARATED 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q7. HAVE YOU ANY CHILDREN UNDER 18 YEARS OF AG? IF YES, HOW MAN?  1. YES, ONE CHILD 2. YES, TWO CHILDREN 3. YES, THREE CHILDREN 4. YES, FOUR OR MORE CHILDREN 5. YES, NO ANSWER 6. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q8. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU I?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED (TANKS) 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY OR AAA 09. AIR CORPS - FLYING JOB 10. AIR CORPS - NON-FLYING JOB 11. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 12. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 13. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 14. MILITARY POLICE 15. TANK DESTROYER 16. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER
S218I.Q9. HOW CLEAR AN IDEA DO YOU HAVE OF WHY WE ARE FIGHTING THIS WA?  1. I HAVE A VERY CLEAR IDEA 2. I HAVE A FAIRLY CLEAR IDEA 3. I AM NOT SO CLEAR 4. I AM NOT AT ALL CLEAR 0. NO ANSWER
S218I.Q10. DO YOU EVER GET THE FEELING THAT THIS WAR IS NOT WORTH FIGHTIN?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONLY ONCE IN A GREAT WHILE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q11. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRIT?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q12. CONSIDERING EVERYTHING, HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT FURTHER SERVICE IN THE ARM?  1. I SHOULD BE DISCHARGED NOW 2. I SHOULD SERVE A WHILE LONGER, BUT I SHOULD NOT HAVE TO STAY IN UNTIL JAPAN IS DEFEATED 3. I SHOULD BE DISCHARGED AS SOON AFTER JAPAN IS DEFEATED AS IS POSSIBLE 4. I WANT TO REMAIN IN THE ARMY AFTER THE WAR 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 13 AND 14 CODED TOGETHER.

S218I.Q13. HOW GOOD DO YOU THINK YOUR CHANCES ARE OF BEING DISCHARGED FROM THE ARMY BEFORE THE WAR WITH JAPAN IS OVE?  Q.14. WHAT ARE THE REASONS FOR YOUR ANSWER TO QUESTION 13*  1. VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. VERY GOOD OR FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE (MEDICAL REASON GIVEN Q.14) 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q15. WHAT IS YOUR BEST GUESS AS TO HOW MUCH LONGER YOU WILL BE IN THE ARMY BEFORE YOU ARE DISCHARGE?  1. LESS THAN 3 MONTHS 2. 3 MONTHS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 6 MONTHS 3. 6 MONTHS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 1 YEAR 4. 1 YEAR UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 1 1/2 YEARS 5. 1 1/2 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 2 YEARS 6. 2 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 3 YEARS 7. 3 YEARS OR MORE 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q16. COMPARED WITH OTHER PEOPLE, HOW GOOD DO YOU THINK YOUR CHANCES WILL BE OF GETTING THE KIND OF JOB YOU WANT BY THE TIME YOU GET OUT OF THE ARM?  1. MY CHANCES WILL BE BETTER THAN MOST PEOPLE'S 2. MY CHANCES WILL BE ABOUT THE SAME AS MOST PEOPLE'S 3. MY CHANCES WILL BE WORSE THAN MOST PEOPLE'S 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q17. IF THE JAPS OFFERED TO STOP FIGHTING NOW AND TRY TO WORK OUT A PEACE IN WHICH BOTH SIDES WOULD HAVE SOMETHING TO SAY ABOUT THE PEACE TERMS, WHICH OF THESE DO YOU THINK WE SHOULD D?  1. WE SHOULD KEEP ON FIGHTING UNTIL THEY ARE COMPLETELY BEATEN 2. WE SHOULD STOP AND TRY TO WORK OUT PEACE TERMS WITH THE JAPS NOW 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q18. HOW DO YOU SIZE UP THE WAR AHEAD IN THE PACIFIC - HAVE WE ALREADY DONE MOST OF THE JOB OR DO WE STILL HAVE THE HARDEST PART OF THE JOB AHEAD OF U?  1. WE HAVE ALREADY PRACTICALLY WON THE WAR AGAINST JAPAN 2. WE STILL HAVE A BIG JOB AHEAD, BUT IT SHOULDN'T BE SO VERY TOUGH 3. WE STILL HAVE TO FACE A HARD STRUGGLE IN WHICH AMERICA WILL SUFFER GREAT LOSSES IN MEN AND MATERIALS 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q19. WHAT IS YOUR GUESS AS TO HOW LONG IT WILL PROBABLY TAKE US TO BEAT JAPA?  01. LESS THAN 6 MONTHS 02. 6 MONTHS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 1 YEAR 03. 1 YEAR UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 1 1/2 YEARS 04. 1 1/2 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 2 YEARS 05. 2 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 2 1/2 YEARS 06. 2 1/2 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 3 YEARS 07. 3 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 4 YEARS 08. 4 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 5 YEARS 09. 5 YEARS OR MORE 10. INDEFINITE OR INDETERMINATE 00. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q20. WHAT IS THE VERY LONGEST YOU THINK JAPAN MIGHT HOLD OUT AGAINST U?  01. LESS THAN 6 MONTHS 02. 6 MONTHS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 1 YEAR 03. 1 YEAR UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 1 1/2 YEARS 04. 1 1/2 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 2 YEARS 05. 2 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 2 1/2 YEARS 06. 2 1/2 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 3 YEARS 07. 3 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 4 YEARS 08. 4 YEARS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 5 YEARS 09. 5 YEARS OR MORE 10. INDEFINITE OR INDETERMINATE 00. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q21. DO YOU THINK JAPAN WILL GIVE UP AND SURRENDER ON OUR TERMS BEFORE THEY LOSE EVERYTHING, OR DO YOU THINK THEY WILL KEEP RIGHT ON FIGHTING TO THE VERY EN?  1. THEY WILL GIVE UP AND SURRENDER 2. THEY WILL KEEP RIGHT ON FIGHTING TO THE VERY END 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q22. IN GENERAL, DO YOU FEEL YOU YOURSELF HAVE GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL FROM THE ARM?  1. YES, IN MOST WAYS I HAVE 2. IN SOME WAYS, YES, IN OTHERS, NO 3. NO, ON THE WHOLE I HAVE NOT GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL 0. NO ANSWER P. HERE ARE SOME QUESTIONS ABOUT THE ARMY REDEPLOYMENT AND READJUSTMENT PLAN. THIS PLAN USES A POINT SYSTEM AND SCORE CARD TO HELP DECIDE WHO GOES HOME FIRST FROM OVERSEAS AND WHO GETS OUT OF THE ARMY FIRST. THE REASON FOR ASKING THESE QUESTIONS IS TO FIND OUT WHAT PARTS OF THE PLAN ARE UNDER- STOOD BY THE MEN IN THE ARMY AND WHAT PARTS THEY NEED TO KNOW MORE ABOUT.

S218I.Q23. FROM WHAT YOU KNOW OF THE PLAN, DO MEN NOW IN THE PACIFIC FIGHTING AGAINST THE JAPS GET POINT SCORES AND A CHANCE TO GET OUT OF THE ARM?  1. YES, THE ARMY PLANS TO INCLUDE MEN NOW IN THE PACIFIC IN THE POINT SYSTEM 2. NO, THE ARMY DOES NOT PLAN TO INCLUDE MEN NOW IN THE PACIFIC IN THE POINT SYSTEM 3. I DON'T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO ABOUT THIS 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q24. SUPPOSE AN OUTFIT NOW IN EUROPE IS GOING TO BE SENT TO FIGHT THE JAPS. WHAT WILL HAPPEN TO MEN IN THE OUTFIT WHO ARE ELIGIBLE TO BE LET OUT BECAUSE THEY HAVE THE HIGHEST POINT SCORE?  1. THE ARMY PLANS TO SEND THEM TO THE PACIFIC ALONG WITH THEIR OUTFIT 2. THE ARMY PLANS TO REPLACE THEM IF POSSIBLE BEFORE THEIR OUTFIT GOES TO THE PACIFIC 3. I DON'T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO ABOUT THIS 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q25. WHAT ABOUT AMERICAN SOLDIERS IN EUROPE WHO ARE ELIGIBLE TO BE LET OUT OF THE ARMY BECAUSE THEY HAVE THE HIGHEST POINT SCORES AND THEREFORE ARE TO BE SENT BACK TO THE STATES. WILL MOST OF THEM BE SENT BACK TO THE U.S. WITHIN THE NEXT 3 MONTH?  1. YES, MOST OF THEM WILL BE SENT TO THE U.S. WITHIN THE NEXT 3 MONTHS 2. NO, MOST OF THEM WILL HAVE TO WAIT MORE THAN 3 MONTHS 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q26. HOW MANY AMERICAN SOLDIERS WHO ARE NOW IN EUROPE DO YOU THINK WILL BE SENT TO FIGHT AGAINST THE JAP?  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM 2. MOST OF THEM 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM 4. ONLY A FEW OF THEM 5. ALMOST NONE OF THEM 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q27A. NOT COUNTING MEDICAL DISCHARGES, HOW MANY SOLDIERS DO YOU THINK WILL BE LET OUT OF THE ARMY DURING THE NEXT SIX MONTH?  1. ALMOST NONE 2. A FAIRLY SMALL NUMBER 3. A FAIRLY LARGE NUMBER 4. A VERY LARGE NUMBER 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q27B. THERE ARE NOW ABOUT EIGHT MILLION MEN IN THE AMERICAN ARMY. NOT COUNTING MEDICAL DISCHARGES, HOW MANY SOLDIERS DO YOU THINK WILL BE LET OUT OF THE ARMY DURING THE NEXT SIX MONTH?  1. PRACTICALLY NONE WILL BE LET OUT 2. LESS THAN ONE-HALF MILLION WILL BE LET OUT 3. ONE-HALF TO ONE MILLION WILL BE LET OUT 4. ONE TO TWO MILLION WILL BE LET OUT 5. TWO TO FOUR MILLION WILL BE LET OUT 6. OVER FOUR MILLION WILL BE LET OUT 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q28. SUPPOSE AN OUTFIT IS SHIPPED FROM EUROPE TO THE PACIFIC BEFORE THERE IS TIME TO REPLACE THE MEN WHO ARE ELIGIBLE TO BE LET OUT BECAUSE THEY HAVE THE HIGHEST POINT SCORES. AS FAR AS YOU KNOW WHAT DOES THE ARMY PLAN TO DO ABOUT THESE MEN WITH VERY HIGH POINT SCORES WHO HAPPEN TO BE SENT TO THE PACIFIC WITH THEIR OUTFI?  1. THEY WILL HAVE TO STAY IN THE PACIFIC WITH THEIR OUTFIT 2. THEY WILL HAVE TO STAY IN THE PACIFIC BUT WILL BE TRANSFERRED TO NON-COMBAT OUTFITS 3. THEY WILL BE REPLACED AND SENT BACK TO THE STATES AS SOON AS POSSIBLE 4. I DON'T KNOW WHAT THE ARMY PLANS TO DO ABOUT THIS 0. NO ANSWER P. THE NEXT QUESTIONS ASK FOR YOUR OWN PERSONAL OPINION. THERE ARE NO RIGHT OR WRONG ANSWERS TO THESE QUESTIONS. SOME PEOPLE BELIEVE ONE WAY AND SOME ANOTHER WAY. SO YOUR ANSWERS SHOULD SHOW WHAT YOUR OWN OPINION IS.

S218I.Q29. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT WHAT YOU'VE DONE IN THIS WA?  1. I FEEL I'VE DONE MY SHARE AS A SOLDIER AND SHOULD BE DISCHARGED 2. I FEEL I'VE ALREADY DONE MY SHARE, BUT I'M READY TO DO MORE 3. I DON'T FEEL I'VE DONE MY SHARE YET 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q30. UNDER THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN, SOME MEN WILL BE RETURNED TO THE STATES BECAUSE THEY HAVE THE HIGHEST POINT SCORES AND THEREFORE WILL BE FIRST IN TURN TO GET OUT OF THE ARMY. HOW MANY OF THESE MEN WHO ARE FIRST IN TURN TO GET OUT OF THE ARMY DO YOU THINK REALLY WILL BE LET OUT SOON AFTER THEY GET BACK TO THE U.S.*  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM WILL BE LET OUT 2. MOST OF THEM WILL BE LET OUT 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM WILL BE LET OUT 4. ONLY A FEW OF THEM WILL BE LET OUT 5. ALMOST NONE OF THEM WILL BE LET OUT 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q31. IN GENERAL, WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM)*  1. IT IS VERY GOOD 2. IT IS FAIRLY GOOD 3. IT IS NOT SO GOOD 4. IT IS NOT GOOD AT ALL 5. I DON'T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT IT TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q32. WHEN YOU FIRST HEARD ABOUT THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM) WHAT DID YOU THINK OF IT THE?  1. I THOUGHT IT WAS A VERY GOOD PLAN 2. I THOUGHT IT WAS A PRETTY GOOD PLAN 3. I THOUGHT IT WAS NOT SUCH A GOOD PLAN 4. I THOUGHT IT WAS NOT A GOOD PLAN AT ALL 5. I DON'T REMEMBER WHAT I THOUGHT 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q33. IN YOUR OPINION, IS THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM) BEING CARRIED OUT THE WAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO B?  1. YES, I THINK IT IS BEING CARRIED OUT THE WAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE 2. NO, I DON'T THINK IT IS BEING CARRIED OUT THE WAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE 3. I DON'T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT THE PLAN TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q34. IF THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM) IS CARRIED OUT IN THE WAY IT IS SUPPOSED TO BE, DO YOU THINK IT WILL GIVE THE MEN A SQUARE DEA?  1. THE PLAN WILL GIVE ALMOST ALL MEN A SQUARE DEAL 2. THE PLAN WILL GIVE MANY MEN A SQUARE DEAL, BUT NOT ALL 3. THE PLAN WILL GIVE SOME MEN A SQUARE DEAL, BUT NOT VERY MANY 4. THE PLAN WILL GIVE VERY FEW MEN A SQUARE DEAL 5. I DON'T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT THE PLAN TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q35. SUPPOSE THE ARMY HAD DECIDED NOT TO USE A POINT SYSTEM FOR THE RELEASE OF ENLISTED MEN, BUT JUST TO USE A "FIRST IN - FIRST OUT" PLAN - THAT IS, TO LET MEN OUT OF THE ARMY IN THE SAME ORDER AS THEY CAME IN AND NOT TO COUNT TIME OVERSEAS, COMBAT AND NUMBER OF CHILDREN. HOW WOULD YOU HAVE FELT ABOUT THI?  1. A FINE IDEA - I WOULD HAVE FAVORED IT VERY MUCH 2. A PRETTY GOOD IDEA 3. I WOULDN'T CARE ONE WAY OR THE OTHER 4. NOT SUCH A GOOD IDEA 5. A POOR IDEA - I WOULD HAVE BEEN BURNED UP ABOUT IT 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q36. HERE ARE FOUR STATEMENTS OF OPINION ABOUT THE POINT SYSTEM. CHECK THE ONE WHICH COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR OPINION.  1. "THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS A GOOD IDEA, AND THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT WELL" 2. "THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS A GOOD IDEA, BUT THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT BADLY" 3. "THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS NOT A GOOD IDEA, BUT THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT WELL" 4. "THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS NOT A GOOD IDEA, AND THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT BADLY" 5. I DON'T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT IT TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER
S218I.Q37A. IN YOUR OPINION, ARE THERE ANY THINGS FOR WHICH POINTS OUGHT TO BE GIVEN THAT ARE NOT USED IN THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM)*  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S218I.Q37B. IN YOUR OPINION, IS THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM) GIVING POINTS FOR ANY THINGS THAT YOU THINK SHOULD NOT BE USE?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q38. AS FAR AS YOU KNOW, HOW MANY POINTS DO YOU HAV?  ANP (ACTUAL NUMBER POINTS) 11. 11 POINTS . . . 88. 88 POINTS 90. 90-99 POINTS 91.100-109 POINTS 92.100-99.I DON'T KNOW WHAT MY POINT SCORE IS 00. NO ANSWER
S218I.Q39A. WHEN THE POINT SYSTEM WAS ANNOUNCED, DID YOU TRY TO FIGURE OUT HOW MANY POINTS YOU'D HAV?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S218I.Q39B. WAS IT EASY OR HARD FOR YOU TO FIGURE OUT HOW MANY POINTS YOU'D HAV?  1. VERY EASY 2. PRETTY EASY 3. PRETTY HARD 4. VERY HARD 5. I DID NOT TRY TO FIGURE OUT MY OWN POINTS 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q40. WHEN YOUR OFFICIAL POINT SCORE WAS FIGURED OUT, DID YOU GET A CHANCE TO SEE I?  1. YES, I SAW MY OFFICIAL POINT SCORE 2. NO, I DID NOT SEE MY OFFICIAL POINT SCORE 3. MY OFFICIAL POINT SCORE HAS NOT BEEN FIGURED OUT YET 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q41. DOES YOUR OFFICIAL POINT SCORE SHOW THE RIGHT NUMBER OF POINTS FOR YO? IF MY OFFICIAL POINT SCORE DOES NOT SHOW THE RIGHT NUMBER OF POINTS, WHAT IS WRON?  1. MY OFFICIAL POINT SCORE HAS NOT BEEN FIGURED OUT YET 2. I DON'T KNOW WHAT MY OFFICIAL POINT SCORE SHOWS 3. MY OFFICIAL POINT SCORE DOES SHOW THE RIGHT NUMBER OF POINTS 4. MY OFFICIAL POINT SCORE DOES NOT SHOW THE RIGHT NUMBER OF POINTS - COMMENTS ABOUT INACCURACIES IN COUNTING (FAILURE TO GIVE CREDIT FOR) CAMPAIGN STARS OR DECORATIONS 5. MY OFFICIAL POINT SCORE DOES NOT SHOW THE RIGHT NUMBER OF POINTS - COMMENTS, BUT NOT ABOUT CAMPAIGN STARS OR DECORATIONS 6. MY OFFICIAL POINT SCORE DOES NOT SHOW THE RIGHT NUMBER OF POINTS - NO COMMENT WRITTEN IN 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q42. IF YOUR OFFICIAL POINT SCORE DOES NOT SHOW THE RIGHT NUMBER OF POINTS FOR YOU, WHAT IS BEING DONE ABOUT I?  1. THE RECORDS ARE STILL BEING CHECKED 2. I DON'T KNOW WHAT IS BEING DONE ABOUT IT, BUT I THINK IT WILL COME OUT ALL RIGHT 3. I DON'T KNOW WHAT IS BEING DONE ABOUT IT, AND I'M AFRAID I WILL LOSE SOME POINTS I DESERVE 4. NOTHING IS BEING DONE ABOUT IT 5. I DON'T KNOW WHAT MY OFFICIAL POINT SCORE IS 6. MY OFFICIAL POINT SCORE SHOWS THE RIGHT NUMBER OF POINTS 0. NO ANSWER
S218I.Q43. AS FAR AS YOU CAN TELL, HOW IS THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM) WORKING OUT UP TO NO?  1. VERY WELL 2. PRETTY WELL 3. PRETTY BADLY 4. VERY BADLY 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q44A. ON THE WHOLE, WHO DO YOU THINK GET THE BEST BREAKS UNDER THE POINT SYSTE?  1. AIR FORCE FLYERS 2. AIR FORCE NON-FLYERS 3. SERVICE FORCE MEN 4. GROUND FORCE MEN 5. ALL GET ABOUT THE SAME BREAKS 6. NO OPINION 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q44B. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THI?  1. THIS IS JUST THE WAY IT OUGHT TO BE 2. THIS ISN'T QUITE RIGHT, BUT I CAN SEE WHY IT HAS TO BE THIS WAY 3. THIS IS WRONG, AND IT SHOULD NOT HAVE BEEN ALLOWED 0. NO ANSWER P. THE ARMY HAS ANNOUNCED THAT MEN WITH POINT SCORES AS HIGH OR HIGHER THAN THE CRITICAL SCORE WILL BE RELEASED FROM THE ARMY AS RAPIDLY AS POSSIBLE. BUT NOT ALL OF THESE MEN WITH ENOUGH POINTS FOR DISCHARGE CAN BE RELEASED RIGHT AWAY.

S218I.Q45. HOW CLEAR AN IDEA DO YOU HAVE ABOUT THE WAY THE ARMY DECIDES WHEN A MAN WITH ENOUGH POINTS FOR DISCHARGE CAN BE LET OUT OF THE ARM?  1. I UNDERSTAND IT VERY WELL 2. I UNDERSTAND IT PRETTY WELL 3. I DON'T UNDERSTAND IT SO WELL 4. I DON'T UNDERSTAND IT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q46. IN YOUR OPINION, HOW FAIR IS THE ARMY'S WAY OF DECIDING WHEN A MAN WITH ENOUGH POINTS FOR DISCHARGE CAN BE LET OUT OF THE ARM?  1. VERY FAIR 2. PRETTY FAIR 3. NOT SO FAIR 4. NOT FAIR AT ALL 5. HAVEN'T ANY IDEA 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q47. IN GENERAL, HOW HARD DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS TRYING TO LET OUT ALL THE MEN WITH ENOUGH POINTS FOR DISCHARG?  1. THE ARMY IS TRYING ITS BEST 2. THE ARMY IS TRYING SOME, BUT NOT HARD ENOUGH 3. THE ARMY IS HARDLY TRYING AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q48. IN GENERAL, HOW HARD DO YOU THINK YOUR OWN OFFICERS ARE TRYING TO SPEED UP THE RELEASE OF THE MEN WITH ENOUGH POINTS FOR DISCHARG?  1. THEY ARE TRYING THEIR BEST 2. THEY ARE TRYING SOME, BUT NOT HARD ENOUGH 3. THEY ARE HARDLY TRYING AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER P. JUST AFTER VE-DAY THE ARMY ANNOUNCED A TEMPORARY CRITICAL SCORE OF 85 POINTS. IN THE NEXT QUESTIONS TELL WHAT HAS HAPPENED TO THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT WHO HAVE AT LEAST 85 POINTS.

S218I.Q49. IN YOUR OUTFIT, HOW MANY OF THE MEN WITH AT LEAST 85 POINTS HAVE BEEN RELEASED SO FA?  1. ALL OF THE MEN WITH AT LEAST 85 POINTS HAVE BEEN RELEASED 2. SOME HAVE, BUT SOME HAVEN'T 3. NONE OF THE MEN WITH AT LEAST 85 POINTS HAVE BEEN RELEASED 4. THERE HAVE BEEN NO MEN IN MY OUTFIT WITH AT LEAST 85 POINTS 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q50. IF IN YOUR OUTFIT SOME OF THE MEN WITH AT LEAST 85 POINTS WERE RELEASED AND SOME WITH AT LEAST 85 POINTS WERE KEPT IN, HOW WAS IT DON? WHAT ONE THING DO YOU THINK WAS MOST IMPORTANT IN DECIDING WHO GOT OUT AND WHO STAYED I?  1. THIS DOES NOT APPLY TO MY OUTFIT 2. THEY LET OUT THE MEN WITH THE VERY HIGHEST POINT SCORES 3. THEY LET OUT THE MEN IN THE LEAST IMPORTANT JOBS 4. THEY LET OUT THE MEN WHOM THEY COULD GET REPLACEMENTS FOR 5. THEY LET OUT THE MEN WHOM THE OFFICERS WANTED TO GET RID OF 6. THEY LET OUT THE MEN WHO WERE SPECIAL FAVORITES OF THE OFFICERS 7. SOMETHING ELSE 8. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

S218I.Q51. YOU HAVE JUST TOLD IN QUESTION 50 WHAT YOU THINK WAS THE MOST IMPORTANT WAY OF DECIDING WHICH MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT GOT OUT - AMONG THOSE WITH AT LEAST 85 POINTS. WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE WAY THIS WAS DONE IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. THE FAIREST POSSIBLE WAY OF DECIDING 2. ALL RIGHT, BUT NOT THE BEST WAY OF DECIDING 3. PRETTY BAD WAY OF DECIDING, BUT IT COULD HAVE BEEN WORSE 4. THE WORST POSSIBLE WAY OF DECIDING 5. THIS DOES NOT APPLY TO MY OUTFIT 0. NO ANSWER I. IF YOU HAVE AT LEAST 85 POINTS OR MORE, ANSWER QUESTIONS 52-58. IF YOU HAVE LESS THAN 85 POINTS, SKIP TO QUESTION 59.

S218I.Q52. WHAT IS YOUR MAIN ARMY DUTY AT PRESEN?  1. I AM WORKING ON A REGULAR JOB 2. I AM TAKING TRAINING OR GOING TO SCHOOL 3. I DON'T HAVE ANY REGULAR DUTIES NOW 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 53 NOT CODED.

S218I.Q54. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN DOING THI?  1. LESS THAN 1 MONTH 2. 1 MONTH UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 2 MONTHS 3. 2 MONTHS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 3 MONTHS 4. 3 MONTHS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 6 MONTHS 5. 6 MONTHS UP TO BUT NOT INCLUDING 1 YEAR 6. 1 YEAR OR MORE 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER

S218I.Q55. WHAT HAVE YOUR OFFICERS TOLD YOU ABOUT THE TIME IT WILL TAKE BEFORE YOU GET OUT OF THE ARM?  01. THEY SAY IT WON'T TAKE MORE THAN 1 MONTH 02. THEY SAY IT WON'T TAKE MORE THAN 3 MONTHS 03. THEY SAY IT WON'T TAKE MORE THAN 6 MONTHS 04. THEY SAY IT WON'T TAKE MORE THAN A YEAR 05. THEY SAY IT WILL TAKE MORE THAN A YEAR 06. THEY SAY I CAN'T GET OUT UNTIL THE WAR IS OVER 07. THEY KEEP TELLING ME DIFFERENT THINGS 08. THEY SAY THEY DON'T HAVE ANY IDEA ABOUT IT 09. THEY HAVE TOLD ME NOTHING ABOUT IT 99. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER

S218I.Q56. WHAT IS THE MAIN REASON YOUR OFFICERS HAVE GIVEN YOU TO EXPLAIN WHY YOU ARE NOT BEING RELEASED FROM THE ARMY FASTE?  1. THEY HAVE TOLD ME NOTHING ABOUT IT 2. THEY SAY I AM BEING HELD UP BECAUSE OTHER MEN HAVE MORE POINTS THAN I HAVE 3. THEY SAY I AM BEING HELD UP BECAUSE SEPARATION CENTERS AND REPLACEMENT CENTERS ARE TOO CROWDED 4. THEY SAY I AM BEING HELD UP BECAUSE THEY HAVE NOT GOT A REPLACEMENT FOR ME YET 5. THEY SAY I AM BEING HELD UP BECAUSE THERE ISN'T ANY TRANSPORTATION FOR ME YET 6. THEY SAY THEY DON'T KNOW WHY I AM BEING HELD UP 7. SOMETHING ELSE 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER

S218I.Q57. WHAT DO YOU THINK ABOUT THE REASON YOUR OFFICERS GAVE YO?  1. I THINK IT IS THE MOST IMPORTANT REASON, AND THE ARMY CAN'T HELP IT 2. I THINK IT IS THE MOST IMPORTANT REASON, BUT ONLY BECAUSE THE ARMY ISN'T DOING THINGS RIGHT 3. I THINK THERE IS ANOTHER REASON THAT IS MORE IMPORTANT 4. I WASN'T TOLD ANY REASON 9. INAPPLICABLE, NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 58 NOT CODED.

S218I.Q59. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL BEFORE ENTERING THE ARM?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER
S218I.Q60. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  1. 19 YEARS OF AGE OR LESS 2. 20-24 YEARS 3. 25-29 YEARS 4. 30-34 YEARS 5. 35-39 YEARS 6. 40 YEARS AND OVER 0. NO ANSWER
S218I.Q61. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN OVERSEAS WITH THE ARMY IN THIS WA?  ANP (ACTUAL NUMBER MONTHS) 02. 2 MONTHS . . . 48. 48 MONTHS 00.NO ANSWER X. COL. 80 NOT USED. CARD 2
S218I.CARD.  2. CARD TWO
